terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Rizzflows ("we," "our," or "us"), a mobile application operated by ADSEGOM LTD. By accessing or using our mobile application (the "App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App.
terms.p1: Rizzflows is an AI-powered dating assistant designed to help users generate reply suggestions, pickup lines, and advice for social situations ("Services"). The App allows users to upload screenshots of conversations or text inputs to receive AI-generated content using third-party technologies.
terms.p2: You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to use Rizzflows. By using the App, you represent and warrant that you meet this age requirement.
terms.p3_intro: IMPORTANT: The content generated by Rizzflows is powered by Artificial Intelligence. AI can make mistakes, "hallucinate," or produce content that may be considered offensive or inappropriate in certain contexts.
terms.p3_li1: • We do not guarantee the accuracy, effectiveness, or safety of the advice provided.
terms.p3_li2: • You are solely responsible for reviewing any message generated by the App before sending it to others.
terms.p3_li3: • ADSEGOM LTD is not liable for any social consequences, relationship issues, or misunderstandings resulting from the use of our suggestions.
terms.p4: To access certain features, you must create an account. We use third-party services for secure authentication. You agree to provide accurate information (such as your name and email) and to keep your credentials confidential. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.p5: Rizzflows offers digital goods (e.g., "Credits") and subscriptions (e.g., "Pro Access") via Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
terms.p5_li1: • Payments: Transactions are processed by the respective app store. ADSEGOM LTD does not store your credit card information directly.
terms.p5_li2: • Subscriptions: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period in your device's account settings.
terms.p5_li3: • Refunds: We do not process refunds directly. Refund requests must be made through Apple or Google in accordance with their refund policies.
terms.p5_li4: • Consumables: Credits purchased (e.g., "5 Rizzflows") are non-refundable and non-transferable.
terms.p6: You agree not to use the App to:
terms.p6_li1: • Upload content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, or invasive of another's privacy.
terms.p6_li2: • Upload images containing sensitive personal information of third parties without their consent.
terms.p6_li3: • Attempt to reverse engineer the App or exploit the API.
terms.p6_li4: • Generate content for malicious purposes, including harassment or hate speech.
terms.p7: The design, code, and original content of Rizzflows are owned by ADSEGOM LTD. You retain rights to the screenshots you upload, but you grant us a license to process them momentarily to provide the Service.
terms.p8: Our Service utilizes third-party services, including AI providers for content generation and backend services for data storage. Your use of the App is also subject to the terms and policies of these third-party providers.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Rizzflows (operated by ADSEGOM LTD), we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.sh1a_li1: • Account Information: When you register, we collect your name and email address. This data is managed by a secure third-party authentication provider.
privacy.sh1a_li2: • User Content: We collect the text inputs and screenshots/images you upload to the App for analysis to generate replies.
privacy.sh1b_li1: • Usage Data: We may collect anonymous data about how you use the App (e.g., features used, frequency) to improve our services.
privacy.sh1b_li2: • Device Information: Information about your device type and operating system to ensure compatibility.
privacy.p2_li1: • Provide, maintain, and improve the Rizzflows App.
privacy.p2_li2: • Process AI Requests: Text and images you upload are sent to third-party AI providers solely for the purpose of generating the response (e.g., pickup lines or replies).
privacy.p2_li4: • Respond to your comments and support requests via email.
privacy.p3: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only as necessary to provide the Service:
privacy.p3_li1: • AI Providers: The text and images you submit for analysis are transmitted to our generative AI partners. These inputs are used strictly for processing your request.
privacy.p3_li2: • Backend Infrastructure: Your user profile and authentication data are stored securely on third-party backend services.
privacy.p3_li3: • Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy.p4: When you upload a screenshot for analysis:
privacy.p4_li1: • The image is converted to a data format and transmitted securely to the AI provider for momentary processing.
privacy.p4_li2: • ADSEGOM LTD does not permanently store your uploaded conversation screenshots on our own servers after the analysis is complete.
privacy.p4_li3: • We retain your account information (email, name) as long as your account is active.
privacy.p5: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information. Access to your account is secured via robust authentication methods. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.p6: You may request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time by using the "Delete Account" feature within the app (if available) or by contacting us directly at info@rizzflows.com.
privacy.p7: Rizzflows is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete it immediately.
privacy.p8: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.p9: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
